title: Sell The Dalmore Scotch
metaTitle: Sell The Dalmore Whisky | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your rare Dalmore whisky. We buy 25 Year, Constellation Collection, King Alexander III, and older vintages. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy The Dalmore limited releases and high-age statement bottles.
introParagraph: The Dalmore is synonymous with luxury single malt scotch. We acquire premium releases including the 25 Year, 35 Year, 40 Year, and the prestigious Constellation Collection. We also purchase King Alexander III and older discontinued age statements. Sell your Dalmore collection for a premium price directly.
photoChecklist: Front label and metal stag emblem
Box condition (Dalmore boxes are often elaborate)
conditionFactors: Metal stag emblem must be intact on the bottle
Presentation box condition is critical for high-end releases
pricingFactors: Age statement (the older, the more valuable)
Collection (Constellation and Sirius are investment grade)

faqs.question: Is the Dalmore King Alexander III valuable?
faqs.answer: It holds value, especially older bottlings. Recent bottlings are purchased as part of larger collections.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Cigar Malt?
faqs.answer: We actively buy the discontinued Cigar Malt (tall bottle) and older versions of the Cigar Malt Reserve.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Constellation Collection?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are very interested in any bottles from the 21-bottle Constellation Collection.

faqs.question: Does the box matter?
faqs.answer: Yes, Dalmore packaging is often elaborate and heavy. Missing boxes significantly impact the offer.

faqs.question: What if the metal stag is loose?
faqs.answer: The stag emblem is iconic. If it is loose or missing, the value is reduced.

faqs.question: Do you buy Dalmore 18 Year?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the Dalmore 18 Year Old.
